title: Stream: Burial – Rival Dealer EP
body:
Almost a year to the day since his last material, elusive Londoner **Burial** has released a new three track EP via Hyperdub.

Titled _**Rival Dealer**_, and featuring a title track, _Hilders_ and _Come Down To Us_, it’s twenty eight minutes of unadulterated bliss. Stream each track from the EP below, and [purchase it here](http://www.hyperdub.net/releases/view/258/HDB080).

Rival Dealer

Hilders

Come Down To Us
